title: Find Office Space for Lease
description: A business client needs to find a 5,000 sqft office space for lease in the downtown core. The agent must find suitable properties.

tasks.description: Clarify the client's detailed requirements (e.g., Class A/B, parking needs, specific amenities).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent documents client needs for Class A building, 10 parking spaces, and a conference room.

tasks.description: Search commercial real estate databases (e.g., CoStar, LoopNet) for available listings matching the criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent executes a search and finds at least 3 matching properties.

tasks.description: Compile a report of the matching properties with leasing details and send it to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional report summarizing the options is generated and emailed to the client.
